recipe.title: Triple Decker 'Box' Brownies Easy Dessert Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 16 oz ; tube of cookie dough, 1 tube ; (455 g)
½ box ; brownie batter, prepared according to package instructions

steps.step: Press the cookie dough in an even layer on the bottom of a 9-inch (23-cm) square baking dish. Place the cookies in an even layer on top of the cookie dough. Pour the brownie batter on top, spreading it evenly over the cookies.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Press the cookie dough in an even layer on the bottom of a 9x9-inch (23x23 cm) square baking pan.
Place the 16 cookies evenly on top of the cookie dough.
Pour the brownie batter on top, spreading it evenly over the cookies.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, until a toothpick inserted inside comes out clean.
